report design

Description:
Exception is thrown out when preview the attached report design with a crosstab.

Build number:
2.3.0.v20071107-0800

Steps to reproduce:
1. Preview the attached report design.

Expected result:

- Setting a numeric interval on a column with type DateTime is not supported.

The report design itself is invalid. It includes level of dateTimeLevelType with data type date-time. But the level of that type should always be of data type "integer". The design is created by an instable version of BIRT so that backward compatibility would not be kept.
